purposes.label: Build Skeleton
purposes.promptFraming: Establish authoritative sources and baseline understanding for this topic. Focus on peer-reviewed sources, established frameworks, and foundational concepts. Prioritize breadth over depth to create a comprehensive scaffold.

purposes.label: Extend Thread
purposes.description: Deepen an existing line of thought
purposes.promptFraming: Build on what exists, find logical next steps. Look for recent developments, adjacent ideas, and natural extensions of this thinking. Follow the thread to see where it leads.

purposes.label: Challenge Assumption
purposes.promptFraming: Find counter-arguments, edge cases, and critiques. Steelman opposing views. Identify conditions under which this claim might fail. Be adversarial but fair.

purposes.label: Fill Gap
purposes.description: Something is missing, need to find it
purposes.promptFraming: Comprehensive survey of what exists on this topic. Identify what has been written, who the key thinkers are, and where the conversation currently stands. Map the territory.

purposes.label: Validate Claim
purposes.description: Confirm something believed to be true
purposes.promptFraming: Find supporting evidence for this claim. Note confidence levels, identify the strongest sources, and flag any caveats or limitations. Be honest about certainty.
